name: Stack Me
description:
Reach the skies in this incredibly simple and addicting game. In Stack Me, you build a tower using animal blocks to build your tower as high as possible. The animals that you can use in Stack Me are the furry cat, fun-loving dog, lazy sheep, baby duck and hungry panda.
When stacking your animal blocks, be careful! If an animal block falls off or your tower topples over, it’s game over and you’ll have to start over!
Play the various game modes to test you skill! Stack Me has different game modes of easy, medium, hard and endless to test your skills.
